capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's role at Hogwarts. He's definitely an important part of the school, and his affiliation with it is clear. I mean, he's been there for so long, and has such a strong connection to the place. It's confirmed that he's a valued member of the staff, and I'm certain that his presence helps shape the students' experiences.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of hogwarts before, can you tell me more about this magical school?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about that, and I think it's a fact that's widely accepted by most people who know him.
capsules_submitted.reply: cool! so harry and hagrid both have an affiliation with hogwarts.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Hagrid, he's just so kind and caring towards the students here at Hogwarts. I mean, who else would take on the responsibility of looking after the Care of Magical Creatures class? He's really made a difference in my life, and I think that's one of the reasons why I love him so much.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of person is hermione?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-documented fact. I'm quite certain about it, and I'd say it's a very positive aspect of her character - she's clearly dedicated to the school and its values.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of hogvy before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Neville is affiliated with Hogvy. I'm pretty sure about that.
capsules_submitted.reply: that makes my day! so neville and hermione are both affiliated with hogwarts.
